|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-MT6000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (Flint 2) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/13/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/GL.iNet_GL-MT6000_(Flint_2) |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-MT6000 |icid = 23019-MT6000 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7986AV;Filogic 830; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = NAND, eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- 3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD512M16C4-JR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8221B; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8221B; |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531AE; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab/3bz |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:83:C4 |oui = 94:83:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |jtag = yes,, 9-pin header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, HE160, OFDMA, Zero Wait DFS, heatsink |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN 802.11ax Front-End Module;Kangxi <!--Communication Technologies-->;KCT8239SD;;4;,,, 5GHz WLAN 802.11ax Front-End Module;Kangxi <!--Communication Technologies-->;KCT8539HE;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GL-MT6000-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^GL-MT6000-[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/06/2023 |estreldate = 11/2023 |estprice = 159 |upc = 6971131384199 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0CP7S3117 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 233 x 137 x 53mm |weight = 761g
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976GN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976AN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MT6000-V1.0" is silk-screened on board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986AV @2.0GHz (''Filogic 830'') :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) 12nm *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR4 3200MHz) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7986AV/MT7976GN/MT7976AN :802.11abgn/ac/ax Dual Band 4x4 2.4GHz + 4x4 5GHz *Network: 2x 2.5GbE (WAN/LAN), 4x 1GbE (LAN) ports *Power Source: 12V/4A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://store-us.gl-inet.com/products/flint-2-gl-mt6000-wi-fi-6-high-performance-home-router Official shop] *[https://docs.gl-inet.com/router/en/4/user_guide/gl-mt6000/ Docs] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official forum] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-mt6000 OpenWrt Device Page]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/12/26/gl-inet-gl-mt6000-flint-2-wifi-6-router-review-unboxing-teardown-first-try/ ''GL.iNet GL-MT6000 “Flint 2” WiFi 6 router review'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/wi-fi-6-router/ ''GL.iNet Flint 2 Wi-Fi 6 GL-MT6000 router with dual 2.5 Gbps'' on '''Geeky Gadgets''']
